variant of 銜|衔[xian2]
variant of 銜|衔[xian2]

sentences.english: The younger Kim was commissioned a four-star general in North Korea's armed forces on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 同时与本周四金正银又被授衔为朝鲜军队四星大将。

sentences.english: Some kinds of commissions promote a military officer only in rank without any increase in pay.
sentences.chinese: 某些授衔令只提高军衔而不增加工资。

sentences.english: He was commissioned a general in 1953.
The Queen conferred a title on the brave sailor.
sentences.chinese: 女王为那个勇敢的水手授衔。

sentences.english: He was commissioned a general in 1953。
The Battalion, known as The Royal Welsh, has had a goat in its ranks for more than 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 该营领养山羊并为其授衔的传统已经有200多年了。
